rules_text:
Trample, haste
[i]Feint Death[/i] – Whenever a creature you control that entered this turn dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
[i]Feroxi Champion[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may put a creature card with power less than Basilio, West Khan of Ferox, onto the battlefield, they gains haste and they must attack this combat if able.
